item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Encryption at host & disk encryption sets support in node auto-provisioning
item.description:
AKS node auto-provisioning now supports Encryption at Host and disk encryption sets, enabling use in clusters with stricter encryption requirements.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure Disk Encryption
item.description:
Azure Disk Encryption will be retired on September 15, 2028; customers are advised to transition to Encryption at Host (or other supported OS-disk encryption solutions such as CVM OS disk encryption) before that date.

  • Source: Azure Updates
